sys_ux_client_script.name: Check Account has Data

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_2edecb44475a3110036bbce5536d43a1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Create Default">2ad63bc7470a3110036bbce5536d4385</macroponent><name>Check Account has Data</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    //Account Data
    var results = api.data.get_all_accounts.results;

    //Clear Account, if Account DB is empty
    if(results == undefined || results.length == 0){
        api.setState('account',{'id':'-1','label':''});
        api.setState('account_query', '');
    } 
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-30 19:41:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>2edecb44475a3110036bbce5536d43a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Account has Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace" source="x_876519_att_work">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2edecb44475a3110036bbce5536d43a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-30 19:41:54</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
